_header: Take the seventeenth in order set
Subjects: riddles; acrostics; lovers, addresses to beloved
_description: ‘Devynale per Pycard’, supposedly giving the name of ‘my dere lady’ — eight lines

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
Take þe seventeþ in ordere setteLynael of þe
                    Abc…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines:
…His þat is wher so shee beMyn owen souerayne
                    lady dere
BLAdd16165.Note:
In penultimate line, ‘h’ of ‘shee’ added above
                    line by Shirley.
